subTitleText.zdocScanTipsDetail: Hold your card within the frame untill all 4 edges turn blue.

instructionText.zdocCapture: Place your ID within the frame and take a picture.
instructionText.zdocConfirm: Make sure your ID is fully visible, glare free and not blurred.

alertText.systemErrorMsg: Sorry, system error. Please try again later.
alertText.networkErrorMsg: Please check your internet connection and try again.
alertText.zdocNofaceMsg: Please make sure the ID is fully visible, glare free and not blurred.
alertText.zdocExposureMsg: Please make sure the ID is fully visible, glare free and not blurred.
alertText.zdocBlurMsg: Please make sure the ID is fully visible, glare free and not blurred.
alertText.zdocImperfectMsg: Please make sure the ID is fully visible, glare free and not blurred.
alertText.zdocWrongDocumentMsg: Make sure you are using the required type of ID.
alertText.zdocUnknowMsg: Make sure you are using the required type of ID.
alertText.zdocTimeOutMsg: Please make sure your ID is clear and non-reflective
alertText.zdocNoDocumentMsg: Make sure you are using the required type of ID.
alertText.zfaceScanFailMsg: Face straight at the phone and ensure your face is light and clear.
alertText.zfaceTimeOutMsg: Please face straight at the camera, making it easier to succeed.
alertText.retryMaxMsg: You have reached the maximum number of attempts. Please try again later.
alertText.unsupportDeviceTitle: Browser or device is not supported
alertText.unsupportDeviceMsg: The browser or device is not supported, please change the browser or device.
